skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scripture study
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Scripture Study is the official skill for accessing the standard works from The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on Alexa devices.
Listen to chapters of scripture from the Old Testament, New Testament, Book of Mormon, Doctrine and Covenants, and Pearl of Great. Continue where you left off each time you open the skill. Scripture Study is a great way to increase the spirit in your daily life through studying the scriptures.
You can send feedback to gospelvoice@ChurchofJesusChrist.org
If you want to know more about The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, please visit: ˜https://www.ChurchofJesusChrist.org/learn/about-us Example Phrases
